channel.title: Comments on: PASS BI VC: How to (not) torment your fellow SSIS developer?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sam Bryant
item.dc:creator: Sam Bryant
item.description:
Excellent presentation Koen. Really enjoyed it and will be sharing it with the rest of my team.
I will now be scanning the rest of your blog.
item.content:encoded:
Excellent presentation Koen. Really enjoyed it and will be sharing it with the rest of my team.

item.title: By: Bill Anton

item.description: Going to try and make it live...but will fall back on YouTube if necessary. Great title and surely going to be a great session.

item.title: By: John Arand
item.dc:creator: John Arand
item.description: Koen, I missed part of your presentation due to issues at work. Where can I get a copy of your slide presentation? Thank you.
item.content:encoded: Koen, I missed part of your presentation due to issues at work. Where can I get a copy of your slide presentation? Thank you.

item.title: By: Joost

item.description: Great idea! I will be traveling to Antwerp at that time, but I will for sure watch it on YouTube afterwards.
